page.title: 10INDUSTRY IN NORTH SCARLE
page.content: Although North Scarle is only a small village it has a lot of industry in it.There are three road transport firms ,DFW'S,Porter's and Jones.Jones are also agricultural engineers,and wholesale butchers. There are two Daylay egg producing sites,Russell Brothers,egg producers and Swifts turkey farms .These all have large sheds full of thousands of chickens or turkeys. There are a number of gravel pits in the area ,and large lorries filled with sand or gravel are a very common sight.When they have taken all the sand and gravel out of the ground they fill the lakes in and the land is used for farming again.We also have a nurseyman in the village who grows fruit bushes and flowers.In the spring the fields are full of daffodils.
